alert.note: Alert for Chambers (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 14 at 3:48PM CDT until June 14 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Chambers, Lee and Tallapoosa. * WHEN...Until 545 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 348 PM CDT, Doppler radar most of heavy rain has ended but some flooding may exist for a few hours. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Auburn, Opelika, Camp Hill, Notasulga, Smiths, Smiths Station, Waverly, Auburn University, Beauregard, Oak Bowery, Beans Mill, Griffen Mill, Beulah, Bleecker, Ladonia, Still Waters Resort, Southern Lake Martin, Loachapoka, Robert G. Pitts Airport and Mount Jefferson.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
